attributes.action: Abolish the TV Licensing authority and pay for the BBC through taxation
attributes.additional_details: It is my understanding the UK Government must overhaul The Communications (Television Licensing) Regulations 2004 in order to repeal the BBC's right to collect the license fee.
attributes.background: The TV Licensing authority collects the license fee that enables the BBC to operate. Since the vast majority of UK homes have a television, why not collect this fee through tax, letting us abolish an organisation which engages in threatening behaviour, demands 6mo upfront payment and delays refunds?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331040
